name: Parents Save Halloween
description:
Note for mobile browser usage: if not quite in screen, grab left or right of window and scroll up/down to center.

Play as one of 3 different parents, each with their own ship and shot pattern!

Game controls:

  • Touch and hold, Click and hold left mouse or use arrow keys/wasd to move.
  • Gun autofires when moving, keyboard press space if you want to fire while holding still.
  • Divert power to candy magnet when not moving or firing.
  • Click icon top right to toggle fullscreen on desktop.

Scoring system:

  • Recover candies for score.
  • Candies recovered closer to top of screen add more score.
